  • java.lang.Object

extends Object

      • getAllProjects

        @GET
public List<Project> getAllProjects()
        Retrieve the list of all projects. This is available to admin only
        Returns:
        all known project

      • getUserProjects

        @GET
@Path("MyOwn")
public List<Project> getUserProjects()
        Get all projects the current user is member of
        Returns:
        list of projects

      • getProject

        @GET
@Path("/{id}")
public Project getProject​(@PathParam("id")
                          Long id)
        Get project identified by the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the project to fetch
        Returns:
        the project or null

      • createProject

        @POST
public Long createProject​(Project project)
        Create a new project and register current user as a member.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to persist
        Returns:
        id of the persisted new project

      • updateProject

        @PUT
public void updateProject​(Project project)
                   throws ColabMergeException
        Save changes to database.
        Parameters:
        project - project to update
        Throws:
        ColabMergeException - if the merge is not possible

@Path("/{id}")

        id - id of the project to delete
